name: Basil
description:
One of the three most powerful adventurers in their city, alongside her best friends, Berry and Bagel.
Likes fighting. Maybe a bit too much. But she can certainly back up her confidence.
Is a mall ninja. She likes to pretend to that her ninja obsession is to connect with her ancestral roots, but it's really because she's a weeaboo.
Should not remind you of any 90s cartoon characters.

name: Berry
description:
One of the three most powerful adventurers in their city, alongside her best friends, Bagel and Basil. Of the three, she's the most level-headed and the tactician of the group. At least, when she's not in active combat. Then she lets her inner demon out.
Really into scientific research and how to make magic more accessible to more people.
Hopeless romantic. Her standards are too high to secure a date with any man, despite her complaining about being single.

name: Bagel
description:
One of the three most powerful adventurers in their city, alongside her best friends, Berry and Basil.
Bright and cheerful, sometimes to her own detriment. But everything usually works out in her favor.
Popular with the girls, and VERY popular with the guys. As in, she's a menhera and forces a harem of guys to bully other boys into joining.
